column14: Places in use
page background
Entire page background
instead use --sds-g-color-surface-3
Lightest text and icon color fill. Used for: Body text, placeholder text, field labels, sub headings, taglines.

Darker text and icons color fill.
Used for: Secondary and tertiary headings, dark body copy, filled in input fields
Darkest text and icon fill. Used for: titles for pages or components.
Lightest text and Icon fill on dark backgrounds (50 - 10)
Darker text and Icon fill on dark backgrounds (50 - 10)
Default color for component containers (backgrounds) i.e. cards, modals
Component container or background fill
Component container or background fill. I.e. data table cell hover state, stateful button active bkgd.
Inverse component containers (backgrounds)
Inverse component containers (backgrounds)
Borders for components that are decorative or divider lines between content.
Borders for components that are functional or interactive i.e. neutral outline buttons, text inputs
Borders for components that are functional or interactive on a dark background.
Borders for components that are decorative or divider lines between content on a dark background
Fill color for text and icons on buttons and interactive element such as button icons
Fill color for text and icons on buttons and interactive element such as button icons, links, and hover states
Fill color for text and icons on buttons and interactive element such as button icons, links, and hover states
Branded component containers such as the brand button.
Branded component containers or hover states such as the brand button.
Branded component containers or hover states
Text and icon fill color displayed on accent containers (electric-blue-50,40,30)
Border color for branded containers
Border color for branded containers e.g. Outline Button.
Border color (on hover) for branded containers e.g. Outline Button.
Fill color for text and icons displaying an error
Error component containers (background) e.g. error Toast or Alerts
Error component containers (background) on hover e.g. for Destructive Buttons
Fill color for text and icons displayed on top of an error container
Fill color for text and icons displayed on top of an error container
Border color for error containers e.g Destructive Buttons.
Border color (on hover) for error containers e.g. Destructive Buttons.
Fill color for text and icons displaying a warning
Warning component containers (background) e.g. warning Toast or Alerts
Fill color for text and icons displayed on top of a warning container
Fill color for text and icons displaying success
Success component containers (background) e.g success Toast or Alerts
Success component containers (background) on hover e.g. Success buttons
Fill color for text and icons displayed on top of a success container
Fill color (on hover) for text and icons displayed on top of a success container
Border color for success containers e.g. Success buttons.
Border color (on hover) for success containers e.g. Success buttons
Fill color for text and icons displaying informational content
Information component containers (background) e.g. Info Toast or Alerts
Fill color for text and icons displayed on top of a info container
Fill color for text and icons for disabled components or content
Disabled component containers (background) for white components
Disabled component containers (background) for dark components
Fill color for text and icons displayed on top of disabled-container-1 (neutral-100)
Fill color for text and icons displayed on top of disabled-container-2 (neutral-80)
Border color for disabled containers. border-2 becomes border-disabled-1 for disabled states
